text: Algorithm to match 2 lists with wildcards
I'm looking for an efficient way to match 2 lists, one wich contains complete information, and one which contains wildcards.
I've been able to do this with wildcards of fixed lengths, but am now trying to do it with wildcards of variable lengths.
would return True as long as all the elements are in the same order in both lists.
I'm working with lists of objects, but used strings above for simplicity.
